metadata.name: Disk Image Creation Via Hdiutil - MacOS
metadata.comment: Detects the execution of the hdiutil utility in order to create a disk image.

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('1') AND endswith(lower(process.name), lower('/hdiutil')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('create')))

output.summary: Detects the execution of the hdiutil utility in order to create a disk image.

metadata.objective: False positive: Legitimate usage of hdiutil by administrators and users. References: https://www.loobins.io/binaries/hdiutil/, https://www.sentinelone.com/blog/from-the-front-linesunsigned-macos-orat-malware-gambles-for-the-win/, https://ss64.com/mac/hdiutil.html
